snippet: Klinsmann is set to coach a young United States team as it challenges Colombia in a friendly international match that he says could be a steppingstone on the path to the next World Cup.
abstract: Jurgen Klinsmann is set to coach a young United States men's national team as it challenges Colombia; says friendly international match in London could set US on path to the next World Cup.
lead_paragraph: Klinsmann is set to coach a young United States team as it challenges Colombia in a friendly international match that he says could be a steppingstone on the path to the next World Cup.

headline.main: Jurgen Klinsmann, Back in London, Sees Exhibition as Important Test for U.S. Men’s National Team
headline.print_headline: Klinsmann, Back in London, Sees Exhibition as Important Test for the U.S.

keywords.value: United States Men's National Soccer Team
